::Killfest/EndBringer/Incarcinator/Scyther/Demise/Crater/Neody/Slayer::

"We blow it down," replies Killfest as he aims his shoulder-mounted missile launcher at a wall, firing two missiles at it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"About time!" yells Scyther as the four members of Killfest's group that were outside the base fly/run forward, opening fire on the base with grenades, missiles, and fast explosive shells.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer watches with dismay as the Predacons begin to win over the Trainer base, looking around for any ex-Trainers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Crater fires several pods into the ground, keeping track of them with his mind as they dig toward the Trainer base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Neody sees his two previous pods surface near the Trainer base, and guides them to slither in, looking for any hostile targets.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He could see a virus being uploaded on the computer screens.
> "Good, ol DarkFate. Ok, Killfest, that armor plate is still up. How the
> hell do we get out of here?"
